review: I have 3 tvs and have been using a Roku on all of them.  I have NEVER had a problem.  I got a new puppy that chewed one of my remotes so I thought I would give the Fire stick a chance.  This item is horrible!  It skips and skips.  The longer you watch tv, the more it skips.  It gets so bad that it resets itself.  Save yourself a headache and just spend a few dollars more and get a ROKU!!!
author: Jane
